mapper.update:
update rtc
doc_date = #{docDate,jdbcType=DATE},
rtc_type = #{rtcType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
psc_reqd = #{pscReqd,jdbcType=CHAR},
psc_num = #{pscNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
vendee_id = #{vendeeId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
vde_fscl_unit_id = #{vdeFsclUnitId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
vde_wareh_id = #{vdeWarehId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
st_unit_id = #{stUnitId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
st_wareh_id = #{stWarehId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
vde_invd = #{vdeInvd,jdbcType=CHAR},
prc_auto_gen = #{prcAutoGen,jdbcType=CHAR},
prc_gen = #{prcGen,jdbcType=CHAR},
prc_auto_chk = #{prcAutoChk,jdbcType=CHAR},
is_pr_itmd = #{isPrItmd,jdbcType=CHAR},
vender_id = #{venderId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
vdr_fscl_unit_id = #{vdrFsclUnitId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
vdr_wareh_id = #{vdrWarehId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
end_unit_id = #{endUnitId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
end_wareh_id = #{endWarehId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
vdr_invd = #{vdrInvd,jdbcType=CHAR},
src_auto_gen = #{srcAutoGen,jdbcType=CHAR},
src_gen = #{srcGen,jdbcType=CHAR},
src_auto_chk = #{srcAutoChk,jdbcType=CHAR},
is_sr_itmd = #{isSrItmd,jdbcType=CHAR},
tran_unit_id = #{tranUnitId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
dr_diff_jgd = #{drDiffJgd,jdbcType=CHAR},
multi_impl = #{multiImpl,jdbcType=CHAR},
prc_site = #{prcSite,jdbcType=CHAR},
reqd_date = #{reqdDate,jdbcType=DATE},
spl_enabled = #{splEnabled,jdbcType=CHAR},
exbl_rate = #{exblRate,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
is_cms = #{isCms,jdbcType=CHAR},
rtna_invd = #{rtnaInvd,jdbcType=CHAR},
acc_enabled = #{accEnabled,jdbcType=CHAR},
rtn_acc_site = #{rtnAccSite,jdbcType=CHAR},
acc_val = #{accVal,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
src_doc_type = #{srcDocType,jdbcType=CHAR},
src_doc_unit_id = #{srcDocUnitId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
src_doc_num = #{srcDocNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
prod_cat_id = #{prodCatId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
rtn_type = #{rtnType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
expd_date = #{expdDate,jdbcType=DATE},
deliv_mthd = #{delivMthd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
deliv_pstd = #{delivPstd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
deliv_addr = #{delivAddr,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
bxi_enabled = #{bxiEnabled,jdbcType=CHAR},
ttl_qty = #{ttlQty,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
ttl_box = #{ttlBox,jdbcType=BIGINT},
ttl_val = #{ttlVal,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
ttl_tax = #{ttlTax,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
ttl_mkv = #{ttlMkv,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
ttl_deliv_qty = #{ttlDelivQty,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
ttl_deliv_box = #{ttlDelivBox,jdbcType=BIGINT},
ttl_deliv_val = #{ttlDelivVal,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
ttl_deliv_tax = #{ttlDelivTax,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
ttl_deliv_mkv = #{ttlDelivMkv,jdbcType=DECIMAL},

ttl_rcv_box = #{ttlRcvBox,jdbcType=BIGINT},
ttl_rcv_val = #{ttlRcvVal,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
ttl_rcv_tax = #{ttlRcvTax,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
ttl_rcv_mkv = #{ttlRcvMkv,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
opr_id = #{oprId,jdbcType=BIGINT},

effective = #{effective,jdbcType=CHAR},
progress = #{progress,jdbcType=CHAR},
cancelled = #{cancelled,jdbcType=CHAR},
exec_rtc_num = #{execRtcNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
itmd_rtc_num = #{itmdRtcNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
st_rtc_num = #{stRtcNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
end_rtc_num = #{endRtcNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
remarks = #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where rtc_num = #{rtcNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update rtc
prc_gen = #{prcGen},
src_gen = #{srcGen},
where rtc_num = #{rtcNum}
update rtc set ttl_qty = 0, ttl_box = 0, ttl_val = 0, ttl_tax = 0, ttl_mkv = 0 where rtc_num = #{rtcNum}

update rtc
vde_fscl_unit_id = #{vdeFsclUnitId},
vdr_fscl_unit_id = #{vdrFsclUnitId},
src_gen = #{srcGen,jdbcType=CHAR},
prc_gen = #{prcGen,jdbcType=CHAR},
effective = #{effective,jdbcType=CHAR},
progress = #{progress,jdbcType=CHAR},
cancelled = #{cancelled,jdbcType=CHAR},
where rtc_num = #{rtcNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
